name: jquery-databasegui
description: This is my first Jquery project, the main goal is to learn how to use it in a effective manner, while developing a simple application. The application is gonna be a web app with a database connection. It's NOT intended to be used for sensitive data. The project is gonna use a SQL local database, instead of a online database, in order to avoid any security issue. It's gonna be a GUI application to simplify the use of the database, but also mantain the terminal functionality if prefered.
